title: The One About Sobriety
description:
Bob and Monét dive into Monét's favorite topic of all time: Sobriety! Bob opens up about his past relationship with alcohol, Monét hypothesizes why she attracts a lot of sober friends, and the two of them discuss AA. Tune in as Bob and Monét attempt to recite the Serenity Prayer in unison.
Go to GreenChef.com/rivalry130 and use code rivalry130 to get $130 off, plus free shipping!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
